__init__¶

The Humble Bundle API

Humble Bundle API¶

A library for interacting with the Humble Bundle data cache.

This is the data cache that Humble Bundle loads client-side when you navigate your products. The goal of this library is to facilitate other tools to be built around the Humble Bundle store, since the web-based index can be limiting.

Specifically, I built this library with the intention of making a Calibre plugin for fetching ebooks remotely.
